Html:
Hello guys ! 

I have a problem ...

I one draw just one line  ( polygon )  .. i mean like this.

I integrated with flight simulator x  and   when the plane is moving  the arrow ( little red marker in the center of map : anyway  how i change this red marker for a little plane ? figure jpg png ?)    in the center of map is moving too , follow the same coordinates.  so this is ready and working! 

but i want put a polygon but just one .. not union  anyone  , because when the plane takeoff from airport1    the polygon is ok ...drawing  if dont go the left or right 
but if i turn direction    the polygons just union all.. 

i dont want this union of polygons .. just   one line  following the mark.
 
 please help me..

im using 

.Net c# 

i have a timer ..inside this timer i put my cod  and the polygon code too.    
when i click in the button  ..the communication with flight simulator x  are started.

i mean disconnect from last point to first point .i cant do that =/

http://www.brgsistemas.com.br/help.jpg


More clear now :)

use route instead, then you can add point and the line will 'continue' follow the plane

p.s. for marker use custom marker, check the demo source how to make it

but route  ( getroute )  need a start and end.. points.

i dont have this ... ..i want just draw one line  follow the custom marker ...   in other post  i see 

Look :

I have a Timer   , this timer.enable   is inside a event button ok ?

inside a timer :

double v1 = double.Parse(txtlat.Text,CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) 

double v2 = double.Parse(txtlog.Text,CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) 

MainMap.Position = new PointLatLng(v1,v2)  ;  // at here is ok !   the data of fsx is received and the map are moving in the same coordinate.

------------------

GmapOverlay lu

lu = new GmapOverlay("p");

MainMap.Overlays.add(lu)

 

polygon = new GmapPolygon(poly,"teste")

polygons.Polygons.Add(polygon);

lu.Polygons.Add(polygon)

this work but the points are connected  .. i dont want connect ...  how i do ? thanks!!
so you want line on your marker? create custom marker and draw that line ;}

its fine now ! ! 

thanks a lot !

i just want change now the custom marker ..   that  red marker in the center of map ..for one figure
